imdb.plot outline: In Yoga for Real Energy, acclaimed instructor and classical pianist Maya Fiennes combines movement, breathing and chanting to energize the body and calm the mind, while strengthening the body's nervous and immune systems. This 60-minute practice is designed to stimulate body's energy centers or chakras.
imdb.title: Gaiam: Maya Fiennes Yoga for Real Life
plot: In Yoga for Real Energy, acclaimed instructor and classical pianist Maya Fiennes combines movement, breathing and chanting to energize the body and calm the mind, while strengthening the body's nervous and immune systems. This 60-minute practice is designed to stimulate body's energy centers or chakras.

In Yoga for Real Life, acclaimed instructor and classical pianist Maya Fiennes combines movement, breathing and chanting to energize the body and relax the mind, while strengthening the body's nervous and immune systems. This 60-minute practice is designed to stimulate the chakras, or body's energy centers.
